Assistance in Reviewing the Claims Folder
Obtain specific written consent from the claimant before allowing a law student, legal intern, or paralegal to access the claimant’s claims folder.
Reference
:  For more information on law students, legal interns, or paralegals accessing a claimant’s claims folder, see
38 CFR 14.629(c)(3)
.
title: M21-1, Part I, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B - A Representative’s Right to Notification and Review of Records
citation: Part I, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B
